import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faXTwitter,faLinkedin,faFacebook}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=_ref=>{let{setActiveSection}=_ref;const currentUrl=window.location.href;// 分享链接
const xShareUrl=`https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=${encodeURIComponent(currentUrl)}&text=Check out this AI Morality Index!`;const linkedinShareUrl=`https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${encodeURIComponent(currentUrl)}`;const facebookUrl=`https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${encodeURIComponent(currentUrl)}`;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"bg-gray-800 text-gray-500 py-6 mt-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto text-center text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center space-x-6 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\xA9 2024 AI Morality Index"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveSection('privacy-policy'),className:"hover:text-blue-300",children:"Privacy Policy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveSection('terms-of-use'),className:"hover:text-blue-300",children:"Terms of Use"}),"          ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveSection('contact'),className:"hover:text-blue-300",children:"Contact Info"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border-t border-gray-600 my-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center space-x-6 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:xShareUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-gray-500 hover:text-blue-400",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faXTwitter,size:"lg"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:linkedinShareUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-gray-500 hover:text-blue-400",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLinkedin,size:"lg"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:facebookUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-gray-500 hover:text-blue-400",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faFacebook,size:"lg"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-600 mt-4",children:"All rights reserved."})]})});};export default Footer;
